hotels.title: Stylish QT Beachside Retreat in the Heart of Bondi
hotels.description: Hang 10 with an escape to super-stylish QT Bondi in Sydney’s iconic Bondi Beach, nestled between buzzing streets, bright sands and balmy Pacific Ocean waves. Live like a local and enjoy everything the world-famous surf spot has to offer from the ultimate launchpad, with complimentary bike and surfboard hire included in every stay. With Sydney’s vibrant CBD only a 30-minute drive away, this seaside sanctuary is enviably close to countless city adventures - explore the Opera House, enjoy a tipple in The Rocks' heritage pubs, admire Sydney Harbour Bridge and much more. When you'd rather stay in and relax, the hotel's extensive room service menu and art-filled interiors make it easy to savour every moment.
